simpleSmart: Simple and smart solution for your business process
aboutText: LLC "Dragle" is an experienced, young and ambitious company founded in 2018 by S. S. Kadyrkhodzhaev. We employ outstanding specialists with experience and knowledge in the field of e-commerce automation, banking and financial analytics. We guarantee promptness, efficiency and reliability of the implemented solutions. Build your digital future with us!
partner_text_2: We do not just create websites and applications, we create effective tools for your business
partner_text_3: We create effective tools for your business
trust: We are trusted by our customers and partners
architect_text: A set of techniques and tools that describe the enterprise information model
seo_text: SEO optimization - actions aimed at improving the site's performance, promoting it to the first lines in search engines, creating a user-friendly interface, as well as finding the target audience
IT_cons_text: A set of works aimed at introducing, optimizing and supporting the functioning of automated reporting and budget management systems, protecting the data warehouse
monitoring_text: Analytics tools for alerts, data display and reporting
BI: Development and implementation of business intelligence systems
BI_text: Thanks to BI systems, it is possible to obtain complete and reliable data on all business processes of your organization in real time.
businessIntelligence: Business intelligence software is a type of application software designed to retrieve, analyze, transform and report data for business intelligence. The applications generally read data that has been previously stored, often - though not necessarily - in a data warehouse or data mart.
hmsMed: Hospital Management System called "Med Online". This systems enhance the ability of health care professionals to coordinate care by providing a patient's health information. It consists of several modules for doctors, nurses, accounting team and cashiers to control overall process of hospitals.
processAutomation: We offer services to automate business processes with software solutions and we provide the most efficient enterprise application with the latest technologies and approaches. Solutions for endless paperwork, lower productivity, employee dissatisfaction.
